page.title: 18FARMING
page.content: MANY FARMS ARE FOUND IN CROWLE AND OUTLYING AREAS. MOST{FARMLAND}IS SCATTERED AND NOT NEAR THE FARM ITSELF. SOME FARMERS KEEP{CATTLE}AND{ {PIGS}, BUT MAINLY THEY GROW{CEREALS} AND{ROOT}CROPS. SEVERAL FARMERS HAVE CHANGED OVER TO GROWING{"PICK YOUR {OWN" CROPS}SUCH AS STRAWBERRIES, AND PEAS WHICH GO FOR PROCESSING. IN GENRAL FEWER PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED IN AGRICULTURE WITH THE INTRODUCTION OF MODERN MACHINERY SUCH AS{POTATO {HARVESTERS}AND{PEA VINERS.} MANY FARMERS HAVE REMOVED HEDGES TO FORM LARGER FIELDS.THE SMALLER FARMERS ARE GRADUALLY BEING BOUGHT OUT IN MANY INSTANCES,BY THE LARGER FARMS. CULTIVATED GRASSLAND IS SCARCE, SCINCE IT HAS BEEN TAKEN OVER AND USED FOR GROWING CROPS. COWS AND PIGS ARE REARED ON AN INTENSIVE SYSTEM.
